Great Getaway Sale

description:
Modern hotel in financial district, near Tower Bridge

Near Tower Bridge
Located in the City of London financial district, this modern DoubleTree puts you an 11-minute walk from Tower Bridge, and only 8 minutes on foot from the Tower of London. Tower Hill Tube Station is just a block and a half away.

Old and new
Magnificent St. Paul's Cathedral is a 20-minute walk from the DoubleTree. After you've had your fill of history, take a 25-minute stroll to Tate Modern, Britain's national gallery of international modern art.

A sweet welcome
You'll enjoy a warm chocolate-chip cookie upon checking in at this hotel. If you're looking for a meal, the main restaurant serves an international menu, with an accent on fresh seasonal fare. Weather permitting, be sure to check out the Skylounge, with its dazzling skyline views.

High-tech perks
All guestrooms are smoke-free and feature free WiFi. Floor-to-ceiling windows frame city views. Each room includes an iMac entertainment system with PC, video conferencing, Skype, and satellite/terrestrial TV channels and radio stations.

DESCRIPTION.value:
Modern hotel in financial district, near Tower Bridge

Near Tower Bridge
Located in the City of London financial district, this modern DoubleTree puts you an 11-minute walk from Tower Bridge, and only 8 minutes on foot from the Tower of London. Tower Hill Tube Station is just a block and a half away.

Old and new
Magnificent St. Paul's Cathedral is a 20-minute walk from the DoubleTree. After you've had your fill of history, take a 25-minute stroll to Tate Modern, Britain's national gallery of international modern art.

A sweet welcome
You'll enjoy a warm chocolate-chip cookie upon checking in at this hotel. If you're looking for a meal, the main restaurant serves an international menu, with an accent on fresh seasonal fare. Weather permitting, be sure to check out the Skylounge, with its dazzling skyline views.

High-tech perks
All guestrooms are smoke-free and feature free WiFi. Floor-to-ceiling windows frame city views. Each room includes an iMac entertainment system with PC, video conferencing, Skype, and satellite/terrestrial TV channels and radio stations.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
Dining is available at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. High-speed wireless Internet access is complimentary. This business-friendly hotel also offers a fitness center, a rooftop terrace, and concierge services. Parking is available onsite for a surcharge.

DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London -Tower of London is a smoke-free property.

DINING.value:
Full breakfasts are available for a surcharge and are served each morning between 6:30 AM and 10:30 AM.
City Cafe - This restaurant specializes in British cuisine and serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar.
Sky Lounge - This brasserie serves lunch and light fare. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar.
Lobby Bar - This bar serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
24-hour room service is available.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

NEARBY_POINTS_OF_INTEREST.value:
Tower of London - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
The Gherkin - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Tower Bridge - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
HMS Belfast - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi

Museum of London - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
St. Paul's Cathedral - 1.5 km / 1 mi
London Stock Exchange - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Tate Modern - 1.6 km / 1 mi

The closest major airports to DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London -Tower of London are:
London (LCY-London City) - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 26.1 km / 16.2 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 39.9 km / 24.8 mi
London (LTN-Luton) - 45.8 km / 28.5 mi
London (STN-Stansted) - 48.2 km / 30 mi

The preferred airport for DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London -Tower of London is London (LCY-London City).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Location
Located in The City of London, this hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Tower of London and The Gherkin. London Bridge and Tower Bridge are also within 15 minutes.

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value:
• A resort fee is included in the total price displayed.
  • The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Fee for full breakfast: GBP 21.50 per person (approximately)
  • Self parking fee: GBP 30.00 per night
  • Rollaway beds are available for an additional fee

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

MANDATORY_HOTEL_IMPOSED_FEES.value:
You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the hotel:


  • Deposit: GBP 50 per night

The charges below are included in your overall room price:

  • Resort fee

We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.

ACCESSIBILITY_OPTION.value: To make requests for specific accessibility needs, complete the "Special or Accessibility Requests" section of "Trip Preferences" when you book your hotel.

TAGLINE.value: 4-star hotel with 2 restaurants, near Tower of London

INTERNET.value:
Rooms
Free WiFi and free wired Internet access

Public areas
Free WiFi

HCOM_KEY_FACTS_AT_CHECK_IN.value:
• Credit card or cash deposit required

  • Government-issued photo ID required

  • Minimum check-in age is 18

HCOM_INTERNET_AT_A_GLANCE.value:
• Free WiFi in public areas

  • Free WiFi and wired Internet access in rooms

HCOM_DINING.value:
City Cafe - This restaurant specializes in British cuisine and serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar.

Sky Lounge - This brasserie serves lunch and light fare. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar.

Lobby Bar - This bar serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

HCOM_FACILITY_POLICIES.value: The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

HCOM_MANDATORY_FEES_IN_BOOKING.value:
The charges below are included in the total price displayed:

  • Resort fee

HCOM_FEES_INROOM.value: Rollaway beds are available for an additional charge

HCOM_FEES_DINING.value: Full breakfast is offered for an extra charge of GBP 21.50 per person (approximately)

GOLD.value: The modern DoubleTree London-Tower of London puts you within a 15-minute walk of Tower Bridge and the Tower of London, while Tower Hill Tube Station is just over a block away. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Guests love the rooftop Skylounge, with its dazzling city views - including famous landmarks like St. Paul's Cathedral and the "Gherkin" building.

GUESTS_LOVE.value:
Guests Love
  • Outstanding service

  • Convenient location near Tube station and Tower of London

  • Great views from outdoor Skylounge

    • Keep in Mind
  • WiFi is spotty in some rooms

END_OF_THE_DAY.value:
At the end of the day
Our guests rave about the fantastic service at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London-Tower of London, as well as its great location close to Tower Bridge and Tower Hill Tube Station. Many love the hotel's bar with a view, but some mention spotty WiFi.

HOTEL_FEATURE.value:
• 582 smoke-free guestrooms
  • 2 restaurants
  • Rooftop terrace
  • Breakfast available
  • Fitness center
  • Self parking
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Daily housekeeping
  • Laundry service
  • Conference space
  • Concierge services
  • Luggage storage

ROOM_FEATURE.value: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London -Tower of London features a rooftop terrace and puts you within a 5-minute walk of Tower of London. Guests can visit the fitness center for a workout or grab a bite to eat at City Cafe, one of 2 restaurants, which serves British cuisine and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Rooms at this upscale hotel offer up nice touches like pillow menus and designer toiletries, along with 24-hour room service and DVD players.

LOCATION_SECTION.value:
• In The City of London
  • Tower of London (0.2 mi / 0.3 km)
  • The Gherkin (0.4 mi / 0.7 km)
  • Tower Bridge (0.5 mi / 0.9 km)
  • Royal Exchange (0.6 mi / 0.9 km)
  • London Bridge (0.7 mi / 1.1 km)

HOTEL_NAME.value: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London -Tower of London
